aStar.heuristics

Interface AStarHeuristic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClosestHeuristic 

    public interface AStarHeuristic

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getEstimatedDistanceToGoal(int startX, int startY, int goalX, int goalY)
      The heuristic tries to guess how far a given Node is from the goal Node.

    • Method Detail

      • getEstimatedDistanceToGoal

        int getEstimatedDistanceToGoal(int startX,
                             int startY,
                             int goalX,
                             int goalY)
        The heuristic tries to guess how far a given Node is from the goal Node. The lower the cost, the more likely a Node will be searched next.
        Parameters:
        startX - The x coordinate of the tile being evaluated
        startY - The y coordinate of the tile being evaluated
        goalX - The x coordinate of the target location
        goalY - The y coordinate of the target location
        Returns:
        The cost associated with the given tile
